scripts.build:deploy: npm run clean && npm run logo && NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=6000 webpack --config webpack/webpack.deploy.config.js
scripts.build:deploy:alt: npm run clean && npm run logo && NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=6000 webpack --config webpack/webpack.deploy-alt.config.js
scripts.build:firebase: npm run build:deploy && npm run copy
scripts.build:firebase:alt: npm run build:deploy:alt && npm run copy
scripts.build:prod: npm run logo && GCLOUD_PROJECT=cactus-app-prod NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack --config webpack/webpack.deploy.config.js --progress
scripts.build:embeds: npm run logo && npm run clean && GCLOUD_PROJECT=cactus-app-prod NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack --config webpack/webpack.embeds.js --progress
scripts.embeds:watch: npm run logo && npm run clean && GCLOUD_PROJECT=cactus-app-prod NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack --config webpack/webpack.embeds.js --progress --watch
scripts.build:analyze: npm run logo && GCLOUD_PROJECT=cactus-app-prod NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack --config webpack/webpack.config.test-prod.js --progress
scripts.build:stage: npm run logo && GCLOUD_PROJECT=cactus-app-stage NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack --config webpack/webpack.deploy.config.js --progress
scripts.build:local: npm run logo && GCLOUD_PROJECT=cactus-app-stage NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack --config webpack/webpack.config.dev.js --progress
scripts.fe: npm run logo && NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack-dev-server --config webpack/webpack.config.fe.js --progress
scripts.fe:prod: npm run logo && NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack-dev-server --config webpack/webpack.config.fe.prod.js --progress
scripts.dev: npm run logo && NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack-dev-server --config webpack/webpack.config.dev.js --progress
scripts.dev:nomaps: npm run logo && NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack-dev-server --config webpack/webpack.config.dev-no-maps.js --progress
scripts.dev:ssl: npm run logo && NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack-dev-server --config webpack/webpack.config.dev.https.js --progress
scripts.dev:prod: npm run logo && NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack-dev-server --config webpack/webpack.config.dev-prod.js --progress
scripts.page:
echo "*********************
This command has been moved to the scripts directory
*********************
"
scripts.page:delete:
echo "*********************
This command has been moved to the scripts directory
*********************
"
